name: Jekangbord
flavorText: "Centuries ago, the mysterious and morbid warrior Jekang found staunch allies among the crusaders of Zakarum. He fought alongside that order for many years, and when he left for lands unknown, he made a parting gift of his grim tower shield." -Rennold's Catalogue of Arms
flavorTextHtml: "Centuries ago, the mysterious and morbid warrior Jekang found staunch allies among the crusaders of Zakarum. He fought alongside that order for many years, and when he left for lands unknown, he made a parting gift of his grim tower shield." -Rennold's Catalogue of Arms

secondary.textHtml: Blessed Shield ricochets to 6 additional enemies and has its damage increased by 379%. [300 - 400]%
